</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM</span></p>
<p class="lead">The governor said mishandling abuse at institutions for the disabled was particularly problematic because &ldquo;We are responsible for people's lives, literally.&rdquo;</p>

</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM</span></p>

<h3>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/11/06/nyregion/at-state-homes-simple-tasks-and-fatal-results.html">In State Care, 1,200 Deaths and Few Answers</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM and RUSS BUETTNER</span></p>
<p class="lead">In New York, it is unusually common for developmentally disabled people in state care to die for reasons other than natural causes.</p>
<ul class="headlinesOnly">
<li>
<h5>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2011/11/05/nyregion/selected-abuse-cases.html">

<h3>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/video/multimedia/100000001154486/the-death-of-james-taylor.html">Video: The Death of James Taylor</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM AND ERIK OLSEN</span></p>
<p class="lead">The mother and sister of James Taylor, who died at age 41 while he was at a group home near Schenectady, N.Y., share their story.</p>

</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM</span></p>

<h3>

</h3>

</h3>

<h3>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/12/14/nyregion/caring-for-disabled-at-home-nonprofits-swim-in-new-york-state-money.html">Aiding Disabled, Nonprofits Rake in State Money</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>RUSS BUETTNER</span></p>
<p class="lead">New York reimburses nonprofit providers for home care for the developmentally disabled at such beneficial rates that it has led to multimillion-dollar surpluses and eye-popping salaries.</p>

<div class="update ">

<a name="November_12,_2011">November 12, 2011</a>

<div class="contentColumn contentColumnLast"> 
<div class="contentFull "> 
<div class="content">
<div class="imgWrapper">
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/11/12/nyregion/ombudsmen-gave-whistle-blowers-names-to-state-agency.html"> 
<div class="imgCtnt">
<img src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/images/2011/11/12/nyregion/12-abused-and-used-seriespage/12-abused-and-used-seriespage-articleInline.jpg"/> 
</div> 
</a>
<p class="credit">Nathaniel Brooks for The New York Times</p>
</div>
<h3>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/11/12/nyregion/ombudsmen-gave-whistle-blowers-names-to-state-agency.html">For Disabled Care Complaints, Vow of Anonymity Was False</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM</span></p>
<p class="lead">New York State has falsely assured its employees who care for the developmentally disabled that they could confidentially report concerns about the treatment of those in their care.</p>
<div class="clear"></div>
</div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div> 
</div>
<div class="update "> 
<p class="updateLabel"> 
<a name="October_16,_2011">October 16, 2011</a> 
</p>
<div class="block blockFull"> 
<div class="contentColumn contentColumnLast"> 
<div class="contentFull "> 
<div class="content">
<h3>
<a href="http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2011/10/15/state-worker-recants-cattle-prod-story/">State Worker Recants Cattle Prod Story</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>DANNY HAKIM</span></p>
<p class="lead">A state worker has recanted a story accusing a supervisor of using a cattle prod on a person with developmental disabilities, state officials said.</p>
<ul class="headlinesOnly">
<li>
<h5>
<a href="http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2011/09/20/state-investigates-cattle-prod-allegation/">
State Investigates Report That Cattle Prod Was Used on Disabled Man at Group Home										</a>
</h5>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="clear"></div>
</div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div> 
</div>
<div class="update "> 
<p class="updateLabel"> 
<a name="August_3,_2011">August 3, 2011</a> 
</p>
<div class="block blockFull"> 
<div class="contentColumn contentColumnLast"> 
<div class="contentFull "> 
<div class="content">
<h3>
<a href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/08/04/nyregion/cause-unclear-for-death-of-ahrc-client-left-in-van.html">For Disabled Man Left in Van, Cause of Death Is Unclear</a>
</h3>
<p class="byline">By <span>RUSS BUETTNER</span></p>
<p class="lead">Alonzo Eason, 48, who was developmentally disabled, was found Tuesday slumped over in his seat; he was pronounced dead at the scene.</p>
<div class="clear"></div>
</div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div>
<div class="clear"></div> 
</div> 
</div>
</div>
<div class="topicUpdateDigestSideBar">
<div class="sideBarCtnt">
<div class="freeform">
<p class="intro">RESOURCES FOR FAMILIES</p>									</div>
<div class="freeform">
<p class="intro">General Information</p>				<ul>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/hp_faqs.jsp">Frequently Asked Questions about OPWDD</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/document/image/hp_brochures_factsaboutdd.pdf">What are Developmental Disabilities?</a> (pdf) </li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_linemap.jsp">Map of Developmental Disabilities Services Offices</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://providerdirectory.opwdd.ny.gov/">Directory of Authorized Service Providers</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/wt/forms/wt_important_facts.jsp">Who is Eligible for OPWDD Services?</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_ibr_resources.jsp">Testing and Assessment Centers</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/document/hp_choosersp.jsp">Guide for Choosing a Residential Service Provider</a></li>
</ul>					</div>
<div class="freeform">
<p class="intro">Incidents and Abuse</p>				<ul>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/document/image/hp_brochures_incident.pdf">The Incident Review Process</a> (pdf)</li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/images/hp_maual_part624_handbook.pdf">Reportable Incidents and Abuse: A Handbook for all OPWDD Providers</a> (pdf)</li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/wt/publications/psa/images/wt_psa_inflictedinjury.pdf">Indicators of Inflicted Injury</a> (pdf)</li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/regs/hp_regs_finaljlawindex.jsp">Jonathan's Law</a></li>
</ul>					</div>
<div class="freeformLast">
<p class="intro">New York State O.P.W.D.D. Offices</p>				<p>The New York State Office for People with Developmental Disabilities
(OPWDD) operates 13 offices that provide housing, employment, and
family support services to individuals with developmental
disabilities. The offices are located throughout the state.</p>
<p><a id="toggleOffices" class="closed" href="javascript: void 0;">Display Offices &raquo;</a></p>
<div id="listOfOffices" style="display: none;">
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_metro_resources.jsp">Metro NY Office</a></strong><br />Serving New York and Bronx Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_fineson_resources.jsp">Bernard M. Fineson Office</a></strong><br />Serving Queens County</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_brooklyn_resources.jsp">Brooklyn Office</a></strong><br />Serving Kings County</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_statenisland_resources.jsp">Staten Island Office</a></strong><br />Serving Richmond County</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_longisland_resources.jsp">Long Island Office</a></strong><br />Serving Nassau and Suffolk Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_hudsonvalley_resources.jsp">Hudson Valley Office</a></strong><br />Serving Westchester, Orange, Rockland & Sullivan Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_taconic_resources.jsp">Taconic Office</a></strong><br />Serving Columbia, Dutchess, Greene, Putnam & Ulster Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_taconic_resources.jsp">Capital District Office (Oswald D. Heck Center)</a></strong><br />Serving Albany, Fulton, Montgomery, Rensselaer, Saratoga, Schenectady,
Schoharie, Warren & Washington Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_capitaldist_resources.jsp">Central New York Office</a></strong><br />Serving Cayuga, Cortland, Herkimer, Lewis, Madison, Oneida, Onondaga &
Oswego Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_broome_resources.jsp">Broome Office</a></strong><br />Serving Broome, Chenango, Delaware, Otsego, Tioga & Tompkins Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_broome_resources.jsp">Finger Lakes Office</a></strong><br />Serving Chemung, Livingston, Monroe, Ontario, Schuyler, Seneca,
Steuben, Wayne, Wyoming & Yates Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_sunmount_resources.jsp">Sunmount Office</a></strong><br />Serving Clinton, Essex, Franklin, Hamilton, Jefferson & St. Lawrence Counties</p>
<p><strong><a target="_blank" href="http://www.opwdd.ny.gov/ws/ws_western_resources.jsp">Western New York Office</a></strong><br />Serving Allegany, Cattaraugus, Chautauqua, Erie, Genesee, Niagara, &
Orleans Counties</p>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://graphics8.nytimes.com/packages/js/nytdesign/lib/jquery/1.6/jquery.min.js"></script> 
<script>
	
	(function($) {

	  	$(document).ready(function( ) {

	  		$("#toggleOffices").click(function( ) {

	  			$("#listOfOffices").slideToggle( );
	  			if($(this).hasClass("closed")) {
	  				$(this).removeClass("closed").addClass("opened").html("Hide Offices &raquo;");
	  			} else {
	  				$(this).removeClass("opened").addClass("closed").html("Display Offices &raquo;");
	  			}

	  		});

	  	});
	
	})(jQuery);

</script>					</div>
